entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023
